text: Are you experiencing difficulty in managing finances or paying bills?
Do you frequently forget appointments or important dates?
Have you experienced a decrease in your overall mental sharpness?
Do you frequently lose track of current conversation topics?
Are you experiencing difficulty in understanding instructions or explanations?
Have you noticed a decline in your motivation or interest in previously enjoyable activities?
Have others expressed concern about your memory or cognitive abilities?
How would you rate your attention span?
Mental fatigue?
Difficulty learning new things?
Difficulty staying focused and concentrating for extended periods of time?
Feeling fatigued when reading sooner than in the past?
Fatigue when driving sooner than in the past?
Overall brain function impairs your daily life?
Twitching or tremor in hands and legs when resting?
Handwriting has gotten smaller and more crowded together?
A loss of smell?
Difficulty staying asleep or falling asleep?
Voice has become softer?
Facial expression that is serious or angry?
Disinterest in hobbies, social activities or work?
Irritable, nervous, shaky or light-headed between meals?
Wake up in the middle of the night?
Reduced function in overall hearing?
Difficulty understanding language with background or scatter noise?
Difficulty spelling familiar words?
Noticeable difference in energy levels throughout the day?
Difficulty coordinating visual inputs and hand movements?
Difficulty motivating yourself to start and finish tasks?
A loss of attention and concentration?
Frequently bumping into the wall or objects?
How would you rate your movement speed?
Difficulty initiating movement?
Abnormal body movements (such as twitching legs)?
Constant nervousness and a restless mind?
Difficulty with balance, or balance that is noticeably worse on one side?
Low brain endurance for focus and concentration?
Must wear socks at night?
Difficulty concentrating before eating?
Feel that you are not accomplishing your life's purpose?
Do you have trouble remembering recent events or conversations?
Are you experiencing difficulty in concentrating on tasks that require mental focus?
Have you noticed a decline in your ability to make decisions or solve problems?
Do you frequently misplace items like keys or glasses?
Have you experienced changes in your ability to follow instructions?
Are you having trouble organizing your thoughts or tasks?
Do you find it challenging to recall names or faces?
Have you noticed a decrease in your vocabulary or difficulty finding the right words?
Are you experiencing confusion about time or location?
Do you struggle with simple math calculation?
Have you noticed a decline in your ability to recognize familiar people or objects?
Are you experiencing difficulty in learning new information or skills?
Do you frequently repeat yourself in conversations?
Are there changes in your ability to perform daily tasks?
